## Fallacy: Low Power at Idle

Low load still consumes a decent amount of power
*Industry challenge*: Design processors to make power proportional to load

# Representing Information

(see Ch 2.3-4, 3.5)

### Motivation

At the computer level, all we have is binary digits (bits)

## Information Encoding

Encoding is assigning representation to information
Encoding is an art
- Complexity
- Efficiency
- Reliability
- Security

Fixed length encoding uses same number of bits for all information
